subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: David Ortiz and Manny Ramírez set the tone with consecutive long, loud solo home runs in the fourth inning off starter Jered Weaver as the Red Sox advanced to the A.L.C.S.
snippet: David Ortiz and Manny Ramírez set the tone with consecutive long, loud solo home runs in the fourth inning off starter Jered Weaver as the Red Sox advanced to the A.L.C.S.
